result.name: residential-support-scheme-as1-form
result.notes: Data is collected by the LSS (on behalf of the EFA) from institutions with students receiving support from the Residential Support Scheme to confirm if the student(s) have completed the academic year. This data is used to determine if  RSS funds should be released for the next academic year.

organization.name: education-funding-agency
organization.title: Education and Skills Funding Agency
organization.description:
The ESFA brings together the former responsibilities of the Education Funding Agency (EFA) and Skills Funding Agency (SFA) to create a single agency accountable for funding education and skills for children, young people and adults.

ESFA is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Education.

result.title: Residential Support Scheme  AS1 Form

extras.value: This data is not to be published because it contains personal data relating to students in receipt of RSS. To publish this data would be a breach of data protection laws
